Get U SPORTS soccer schedule

Source: R/soccer_schedule.R
soccer_schedule.Rd

Get U SPORTS soccer schedule

Usage

soccer_schedule(gender)

Arguments

gender

Gender of athletes "m" or "w"

Value

A tibble.

Examples

soccer_schedule("m")
#> # A tibble: 5,283 × 14
